All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdvancedHunterStrategy
The AdvancedHunterStrategy class implements the IHunterStrategy interface.
AdvancedMonsterStrategy
The AdvancedMonsterStrategy class implements the IMonsterStrategy interface.
Cell
Represents a cell in a grid.
Coordinates
This class represents coordinates in terms of rows and columns.
Game
The Game class represents a game instance.
Hunter
The Hunter class is a subclass of Player that represents a hunter in a game.
Item
The Item enum represents different types of items that can be used in the game.
Main
The Main class is the entry point of the application.
Maze
This class represents a maze.
Monster
Represents a monster in the game.
Observer
The Observer interface provides methods to update the state of a subject.
Path
Path class provides methods to retrieve paths for resources like textures.
Player
The Player class is an abstract class that represents a player in a game.
RandomHunterStrategy
The RandomHunterStrategy class implements the IHunterStrategy interface.
RandomMonsterStrategy
The RandomMonsterStrategy class implements the IMonsterStrategy interface.
Subject
A Subject represents an abstract class that serves as the basis for implementing the observer pattern.
Texture
The Texture class provides static methods and variables for loading and managing textures used in the application.
Themes
Enumeration of the themes available for the application.
